>>>>> "Chris" == Chris Croome <chris@...> writes:

    Chris> Hi There is an interesting document here:

    Chris>   Hacking HTTP Authentication with mod_perl

    Chris>   http://wiki.slugbug.org.uk/HTTP_Authentication

    Chris> Which basically explain how to set up logging in and out
    Chris> using HTTP Authentication.

    Chris> The inability to log out and in again is often cited as the
    Chris> reason for using cookie and form of authentication.

brilliant, thanks a lot for this post!
